name: MEIN KAMPF MINE COUGH
description: Where to even begin with this one? What started off as a simple play on words based on sounds became a much darker read on society during the pandemic era. We can create a parable to today's society by switching the words MEIN KAMPF to MINE COUGH. MINE COUGH is a play on words and refers to the era of COVID19. It illustrates how (MEIN KAMPF, Adolf Hitler's autobiographical manifesto, which became the tenets of Nazism and the Nazi Party's rise in Germany in the late 1920s & 1930s as propaganda. It was used back then to foment anger, hate, distrust, misinformation, etc. It incited and unleashed the worst of humanity upon itself and that very tactic is being used again today by the Trump Administration. Some of the tactics are more low-key like using Q-Anon as a way to distance himself and his cohorts from being personally liable , some are more on the nose Nazi tactics like dehumanizing the opposition, anti-semitism, controlling the narrative using his bully pulpit as an unending daily barrage of misinformation, or focusing on a national myth like making America Great Again. Future readers, please know it was a shit show from start to finish.
